content.description: Predict the outcome of code. (2017 Fall, Quest, Question 9)

p.line: We want to identify the maximum value in a list of one or more integers. Our algorithm works as follows:
Set a variable max to the first data value. Iterate through the listâ€™s remaining values. For each item, if a data value is greater than the value of the variable max, set max to the data value.

content.hint: there is constant work per step through the list (just a compare).
